main event: A UFO observation recorded by Project Blue Book in September 1962 involving a single object seen via ground radar.
interesting points: The object was described as pulsating intermittently and appeared to behave erratically on the radar., The observation lasted for 38 minutes with continuous tracking of the object., The sighting happened at an elevation of 38,000 feet and azimuth of 250 degrees., Two witnesses reported the event., The report suggests that the sighting likely originates from a satellite, but data was deemed insufficient for a conclusive evaluation.
sighted object: an object appearing as a 1st magnitude star
witness description: Two observers recorded the sighting via ground radar.
